Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Entitles Robert V. Vassallo, Sr. to reapply for a disability retirement from the New York state police
Summary: Grants Robert V. Vassallo, Sr. disability retirement from the state police.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to entitling Robert V. Vassallo, Sr. to reapply for a disability retirement from the New York state police
